title: Player Metadata
description: Information about a player (not their character)

player_name.description: Real name or preferred name of the player

characters_controlled.description: List of character names this player controls

permissions.description: What this player is allowed to do

can_view_other_sheets.description: Whether player can see other characters' full stats

can_edit_world.description: Whether player can modify world files (usually DM only)

joined_date.description: When this player joined the campaign
